entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bachelors Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
